title: Coronation Street spoilers: Gary goes to extreme lengths to dig the dirt on Ali
text:
Gary Windass (Mikey North) has growing ever so close to Maria Connor (Samia Longchambon) in Coronation Street over the last couple of weeks, but Ali Neeson (James Burrows) has proven to be a thorn in his side. However, he sets about rectifying the situation in the coming episodes, as he digs the dirt on the local doc.

It’s become pretty clear over the last couple of months that Gary has set his sights on Maria. However, her history with Ali has somewhat prevented him from being able to take his developing feelings one step further, and thus he’s determined to do something about it.

Coronation Street has revealed that — in the coming episodes — Gary gets his PI on the case, so that he can find out something about Ali. The PI later reports back to his boss with knowledge that Ali has been missing shifts at work, and has been acting rather odd as of late.

With his interest piqued, Gary then asks the PI to investigate further and, afterwards, he discovers that a hospital pharmacist was arrested for stealing — and supplying — drugs.

Gary sets about finding said drug dealer — who goes by the name of Big Farmer — and once he locates him, he drags him into the furniture shop and demands that he reveal everything there is to know about Ali.

The question is: will Big Farmer reveal the truth and thus give Gary the leverage he needs?

It’s a possibility, but Gary had better not underestimate Ali, as the doc makes a discovery himself, when he reveals the he’s in possession of Gary’s ledger, before threatening to inform to Maria that he’s operating as a loan shark.

With both men seemingly desperate to get dirt on the other, who will get the upper hand?

Gary’s on a mission, and we know that his dark side isn’t going anywhere anytime soon, so Ali could be in danger.

Coronation Street continues Monday 28thNovember at 7:30pm on ITV.
